channel.title: dataTile for Mac Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.6
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> <head> <style> body { font-family: Helvetica, Arial, Sans-Serif; } </style> </head> <body> <li> A new preferences tab allows users to turn on and off distinct features to reduce the app workload. <li> Log signpost intervals are now automatically displayed as a timer tile <li> Users can now turn on or off automatically detecting running apps in the Simulator </body> </html>
